text: I have an Excel 2000 file with 10 columns, 2 of which are boolean. For the particular row in question, HSSFRow.getPhysicalNumberOfCells() reports 8 cells. The boolean cells are returned as null from HSSFRow.getCell ().
creator: douglas.bitting@agilesoft.com
glens@apache.org
glens@apache.org
text:
Nope, not a known issue...  I think it may have been my fault.  BoolErr record 
was missing from the RecordGenerator class.  I will be submitting a fix as soon 
as CVS finishes updating (which could take a while over my 33.6k modem.

creator: glens@apache.org
text: Fixed.  Will be available on upcoming 1.5 release.
